title: BaseEntry
description: The shared properties for all entries

journal_id.description: The unique identifier of the journal (UUID v4) this entry belongs to

entry_id.description: The unique identifier for the entry (UUID v4)

entry_datetime.description: The date and time the entry was logged in UTC in RFC3339 format

revision.description: The revision timestamp of this entry. Should be the time it was created.

immutable.description: Indicates this entry cannot be replaced with future revisions (default)

remarks.description: Free form remarks that are to be added to this journal entry
